{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Chumby |model=CHB-805 |upc=810542010401 |price=199.99 |est_release_date=April 2011 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=media player |fcc_id=N9ZNS-DP8CH |fcc_date=03/18/2010 |flags=Audio out (3.5mm), LCD screen, RTC w/ battery backup, |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel plug |pwr_barrel_outer=3.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=1.3 |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88AP166 |cpu1_cspeed=800 |fla1=0 |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY5PS1G1631C-FP-S6 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, CompactFlash, SDHC, |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag=yes,, 16-pin header,, unpopulated,, J1 |serial=yes,, 3.3V TTL,, 5-pin header,, unpopulated,, (115200,8,N,1),, J101 |wi1_module=AzureWave AW-GH321 |wi1_module_if=SDIO (module) |wi1_chip1_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip1_model=88W8686 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |eth_none=true |802dot11_protocols=bg |addl_chips=High Performance MCU;STMicro;STM32F101;;1;,,, 2-port USB hub controller and card reader;Alcor Micro;AU6350;;1;,,, Stereo CODEC w/ Speaker Drivers;Wolfson;WM8961;;1;,,, Multi-functional Power Management Unit;TI;LM26480;;1;,,, Adjustable Triple Channel TFT LCD DC/DC Converter;Advanced Analog Tech;AAT1118;;1;,,, 4-Bit Dual-Supply Bus Transceiver;TI;SN74AVC4T245;;3;,,, Backlight Driver IC;Microchip;MIC2287;;1;,,, |stock_boot=U-Boot;2009.07 |stock_os=Linux;2.6.28-M2.1.8.12 |tp_firmware=Zurk's Offline Firmware |oui=00:24:23 }} [http://www.chumby.com Product page]
[http://wiki.chumby.com/index.php/Main_Page Chumby Wiki] :The codename for the '''Chumby''' 8 is '''Opus/Silvermoon'''.
The Chumby 8 has an 800x600 touchscreen LCD.
[http://sourceforge.net/projects/zurk/files/?source=navbar Zurk's Offline Firmware]
